title: Jackyl - Cut The Crap (VBR0)
description:
Artist: Jackyl
Album: Cut The Crap
Release: 1997
Bitrate: VBR0
Genre: Hard Rock
File Size: 75.5MB
====================================
Track List: 

1. Dumb Ass Country Boy
2. Locked and Loaded
3. Open Up
4. Misery Loves Company
5. Lets Don&#039;t Go There
6. Cut the Crap
7. Twice as Ugly
8. God Strike Me Dead
9. Thanks For the Grammy
10. Speak of the Devil
11. Push Pull

====================================
By the time Jackyl recorded Cut the Crap, they had fallen out of the spotlight and were slugging it out on the hard rock/metal circuit without much success. Part of the problem was that the group&#039;s novelty had faded away, and they weren&#039;t even that interested in making ridiculous rockers like "The Lumberjack" anymore. So, what was left was a credible AC/DC rip-off that didn&#039;t have as many hooks as AC/DC. Even if Cut the Crap isn&#039;t much more than subpar Angus Young, it is a more inspired record than Night of the Living Dead and it occasionally does rock with energy, but it doesn&#039;t have the weirdly bawdy humor that made Jackyl&#039;s debut a guilty pleasure.

The song "Locked and Loaded" features AC/DC lead singer Brian Johnson as guest vocalist. The song is cowritten by Johnson as well.
